instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors and font families defined above.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Apply the 'noise' texture to the body background in index.css to give a film-grain look.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' for a sharper, industrial look.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts with the custom color palette (Primary: Cyan, Secondary: Violet).
6. AI WRITER: For the AI contract writer, use a 'terminal' aesthetic - black background, green/cyan mono text.
7. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. Keep it solid White or Cyan for maximum contrast.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button and input has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
